law.catch_line: A cooperative may be incorporated for any combination of the following purposes:...
law.text:
A cooperative may be incorporated for any combination of the following purposes:
Collectively to produce, process, prepare for market, handle, store, and market the products of persons engaged in the production of agricultural or fishery products;
To act as a selling or buying agent for its members; and
To purchase or otherwise acquire goods or services for its members.
